False Faces Masks

Commedia dell’Arte

Pantalone, Zanni, Arlecchino and more — masks rooted in the Italian tradition of comic archetypes.

Pedagogical

Neutral, larval, and training masks for teaching physical theatre and mask work.

Festival

Traditional folk masks and creations designed for street theatre, ritual, and celebration.

Other

The masks that won't fit in the other categories.

Unseen Things, Lyndhurst, England, United Kingdom
